items.content_html: KaliPHP is a fast, lightweight PHP framework. In an age where frameworks are a dime a dozen, We believe that KaliPHP will stand out in the crowd. It will do this by combining all the things you love about the great frameworks out there, while getting rid of the bad.
items.title: owner888/kaliphp: KaliPHP is a fast, lightweight PHP framework. In an age where frameworks are a dime a dozen, We believe that KaliPHP will stand out in the crowd. It will do this by combining all the things you love about the great frameworks out there, while getting rid of the bad.

items.content_html: Kalpanix is a lightweight CSS framework that provides a simple CDN and pre-designed classes for creating responsive, modern web designs. Just include the CDN and apply the classes in your HTML to instantly style your site with ease and flexibility. Perfect for fast, clean UI development.
items.title: bids24/Kalpanix: Kalpanix is a lightweight CSS framework that provides a simple CDN and pre-designed classes for creating responsive, modern web designs. Just include the CDN and apply the classes in your HTML to instantly style your site with ease and flexibility. Perfect for fast, clean UI development.

items.content_html: A fun and interactive typing game where players practice typing a given story within a time limit. HumanType calculates Words Per Minute (WPM), accuracy, and other performance statistics, helping users improve their typing speed and precision.Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a lightweight and responsive experience.
items.title: MrJerif/humantype: A fun and interactive typing game where players practice typing a given story within a time limit. HumanType calculates Words Per Minute (WPM), accuracy, and other performance statistics, helping users improve their typing speed and precision.Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a lightweight and responsive experience.
